ECHO.description: Echoes back the request payload — useful for connectivity testing

ARITHMETIC.description: Basic arithmetic: ADD, SUB, MUL, DIV, MOD, POW

STRING_TRANSFORM.description: String operations via DGHandlerProxy: UPPER, LOWER, REVERSE, WORD_COUNT, REPEAT, TITLE_CASE, CHAR_COUNT

config.metadata: POJO handler — wrapped by DGHandlerProxy at runtime

HASH.description: Hashing & encoding: MD5, SHA256, SHA512, BASE64, HEX, UUID, CHECKSUM

JSON_TRANSFORM.description: JSON manipulation: FLATTEN, UNFLATTEN, MERGE, PICK, OMIT, RENAME_KEYS, SORT_KEYS

DELAYED.description: Simulates a long-running handler with configurable delay (for TTL testing)

WS_DEMO.description: WebSocket demo handler: SYSTEM_PROBE, MARKET_TICK, PING_BURST, DATA_GENERATE operations for the WebSocket Playground

CHAIN.description: Declarative pipeline handler: executes a chain of handlers sequentially, conditionally, or in parallel

SYSTEM_INFO.description: Returns JVM runtime, OS, memory, and system environment information

HTTP_PROBE.description: Probes a remote HTTP/HTTPS endpoint and returns status, headers, timing, and body preview

BATCH_ARITHMETIC.description: Batch arithmetic operations on arrays of numbers with statistics (sum, avg, min, max, stddev)

PDC_PROCESS.description: Publish-Deliver-Consume: POSTs to REST, subscribes to broker topic via Input Channel, forwards messages to Output Channel
